text.autoconfig.taleofkingdoms.title: Tale of Kingdoms 配置
category.taleofkingdoms.keys: Tale of Kingdoms: A new Conquest
menu.taleofkingdoms.guild_master.name: Guild Master
menu.taleofkingdoms.blacksmith.name: 鐵匠
menu.taleofkingdoms.banker.name: 銀行老闆
menu.taleofkingdoms.banker.total_money: Total Money You Have: %d Gold Coins
menu.taleofkingdoms.banker.total_money_b: Total Money in the Bank: %d Gold Coins
menu.taleofkingdoms.foodshop.name: 食品商
menu.taleofkingdoms.startconquest.name: 開始征途
menu.taleofkingdoms.startconquest.exit: Press ESC to manually generate the guild elsewhere.
menu.taleofkingdoms.startconquest.closed: Start conquest menu was closed. Press %s to open it again.
menu.taleofkingdoms.shop.total_money: Shop Menu - Total Money: %d Gold Coins
menu.taleofkingdoms.innkeeper.no_rooms: House Keeper: It seems there are no rooms available at this time.
menu.taleofkingdoms.foreman.total_money: Foreman Menu - Total Money: %d Gold Coins
menu.taleofkingdoms.citybuilder.total_mo: Build Menu %s - Total Money: %d Gold Coins
menu.taleofkingdoms.citybuilder.build_co: Are you sure you want to build here?
menu.taleofkingdoms.citybuilder.destroy: WARNING: When building it will destroy the area around it to make space.
menu.taleofkingdoms.citybuilder.destroy_: ANY BLOCKS, INCLUDING CHESTS, WILL BE REMOVED WITHOUT DROPPING ITEMS!
menu.taleofkingdoms.warden.recruit.knigh: Recruit a knight to your kingdom.
menu.taleofkingdoms.warden.recruit.arche: Recruit an archer to your kingdom.
menu.taleofkingdoms.warden.buy_cost: Recruiting an archer or knight costs 1000 gold.
menu.taleofkingdoms.warden.recall: Recall all defenders to the barracks.
entity.foreman.need_resources: Foreman: Do you need resources sir?
entity.foreman.collect_resources_empty: Foreman: Come back again later when we have some resources!
entity.foreman.buy_worker: Foreman: They will begin work immediately!
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.farmer.take_b: 農民：來拿點免費麵包吧！
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.farmer.got_br: 農民：你今天已經拿過麵包了！
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmaster.c: 公會會長：你現在是我們的一員了，朋友。去斬殺怪物吧，你很快就能配得上你的頭銜了。
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmaster.w: Guild Master: Welcome to the order, hero.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmaster.n: 公會會長：你手下還沒有獵人。
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmaster.h: 公會會長：我的徒弟！公會遭到襲擊，我需要你的幫助！我們必須立刻趕回公會！
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmaster.s: 公會會長：待在我身邊，我會治療你。
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmaster.r: 公會會長：我們已經盡力而為了。現在我們應該重建公會並收集64個木頭，其他人負責清理和施工建設！
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmaster.k: 公會會長：打趴那些混蛋，那邊還剩下一些！
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmaster.t: 公會會長：謝謝你，英雄。你已經證明了自己是一位傑出的領袖！然而你的王道征途並沒有結束。我將回到公會，希望你能繼續努力。
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmember.f: 公會成員：向你致意！你看起來是位強大的戰士...... 給我一把木劍，我們來切磋一下吧！
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmember.g: 你是位優秀的戰士！我會告訴會長你的實力！
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.innkeeper.res: 驛站老闆：先生，您要不要在這落腳休息？
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.innkeeper.lea: 驛站老闆：祝你今天愉快！
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.shop.close: 商店老闆：謝謝惠顧！歡迎下次光臨！
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.bank.open: 銀行老闆：我會保證你的財產安全！
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.bank.no_spend: 銀行老闆：我承諾我不會花掉它。
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.bank.zero: 銀行老闆：你沒錢了！去跟怪物戰鬥來賺錢吧。
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.bank.input: 銀行老闆：請輸入一組數字。
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.citybuilder.m: City Builder: My king you are still not worthy of creating a kingdom. The Guild Master will prepare you!
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.citybuilder.b: City Builder: Let us build your city my liege! Lead the way!
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.citybuilder.d: City Builder: We must keep distance from the guild sir! (%d/%d)
entity_type.taleokfingdoms.citybuilder.g: City Builder: Just keep on building.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.warden.gui.op: Warden: The guild's warden, at your service.
menu.taleofkingdoms.innkeeper.name: Innkeeper
generic.taleofkingdoms.need_contract: House Keeper: You need a contract for that! Go and visit the Guild Master upstairs!
generic.taleofkingdoms.serve: I will serve you, my liege!
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.lone.help: Survivor: I am greatly lost, my king, I survived the attack but many of our villages burned down. There are still survivors left, hurry and rescue them!
generic.taleofkingdoms.darkness:
The Great Tides of Darkness have come.
The Reficules have ravaged the Kingdom's land, and it is you that must save what is left.
You are the last heir to the throne - the only hope for the overworld.
Build your forces and vanquish evil.
generic.taleofkingdoms.hero: Your adventure starts here, hero. The Guild will prepare you...
Thank the heavens! Our village was attacked by the reficules. Please, lead me back to the guild.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.lone.thank: My king! Thank you for saving them! I will let the §eGuild Master§r know of your efforts.
Lost Villager: My king! Thank you for saving me.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.guildmaster.c: Guild Master: We await your participation, hero.
entity_type.taleofkingdoms.villager.ask_: Villager: My king! Do you need a worker? Give me an axe and a pickaxe and I will work for you.
